alert.note: Alert for Preston (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 6:59PM EDT until June 26 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Fayette County in southwestern Pennsylvania... Northern Preston County in northeastern West Virginia... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 659 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kingwood, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... Kingwood, Reedsville, Masontown, Albright, Valley Point, Hazelton, and Cranesville. This includes Interstate 68 in West Virginia between mile markers 26 and 31. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
